SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT42_LNK
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent to the user by the system to refuse an 02 Login Request Message. The system does not create a GPA session for this LT.
From: GPA To: User
Notes Any user who does not get a response from the system to an 02 Login Request Message, or who receives a 42 Login Negative Acknowledgement (LNK) with an error code L35, should contact the Customer Service Centre.
Field tag 502 is mandatory in SWIFTNet Phase 1 and not allowed in SWIFTNet Phase 2.

SystemField.Name: error-code-l/s
SystemField.description: Reason why the login was rejected. Error code is in the form Lnn where nn is a two-digit number. See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of error codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: error-code-l/s
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Reason why the login was rejected. Error code is in the form Lnn where nn is a two-digit number. See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of error codes.

SystemField.Name: date-time
SystemField.description: Date and time, local to the user, of the rejection.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.
